constraints.name: time_constraint
constraints.description: 狗的释放时间必须晚于飞盘的投掷时间（T_d > T_f）

constraints.name: height_constraint
constraints.description: 狗的最大跳跃高度必须小于飞盘的初始高度（H_d < H_f）

constraints.name: velocity_invariance
constraints.description: 狗在跳跃过程中水平速度不变，且可以瞬间改变或反转方向
constraints.formal: v_horizontal = constant during jump, and can change or reverse instantly

constraints.name: acceleration_difference
constraints.description: 狗和飞盘的垂直加速度不同（狗的加速度为 3 mm/ms^2，飞盘的加速度为 1 mm/ms^2）

constraints.name: optimal_path
constraints.description: 狗会采取最优路径以最小化往返时间
constraints.formal: minimize total time for dog to catch frisbee and return
